synonyms.synonym: Bone morphogenetic protein receptor type II

protein.general_function: Involved in transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: On ligand binding, forms a receptor complex consisting of two type II and two type I transmembrane serine/threonine kinases. Type II receptors phosphorylate and activate type I receptors which autophosphorylate, then bind and activate SMAD transcriptional regulators. Binds to BMP-7, BMP-2 and, less efficiently, BMP-4. Binding is weak but enhanced by the presence of type I receptors for BMPs

go_class.description: transforming growth factor beta receptor activity
receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase activity
